divs: Sighting DetailsI was stepping out my front door,(in orchards)vancouver,to smoke a cigarette.I always look up at the stars,my house faces south.To the right of me (west)I saw a large,dark orange glowing object.coming into view.At first I thought it was fireworks or a flare.but it was moving very fast toward this direction.My son was in his room,He is almost 14,I yelled immediately for him to come out and look.it continued west,then slowed,and lights got dimmer and brighter,almost the color of the sun.It seemed round,and then slightly elongated,it seemed to hover,aproximately in the area south of P D X.then it turned and headed south.This was 10:45 pm.we were very excited,My son was a little fearful,we watched,for a total of 4-5 minutes as it silently flew out of our sight.....Someone said,they thought it was the space station,I have seen that twice,and this I can say (from my experience)was not the space station.it was far too low in the sky,and too large,and looked like it was on fire,because of the color.Also,the radio,101.1 a caller reported a sighting in portland or.at 10:28 pm.when compared to the stars in the sky....it dwarfed them in size.The craft or object was silent.
trends: There have been 54 other sightings in Vancouver
There were no other sightings in Vancouver on or around June 19th 2012
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
Summary: Bright orange/gold sun like in color.silent,Large salad plate in size from where I was.light seemed to be glowing brighter and dimmer.
